divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS 11.30P I GUESS, I WAS IN MY COMPUTER FINISHING MY JOB, SO BY THE TIME IT WAS, I LET THE DOG GET OUT OF THE HOUSE TO GIVE HIM A CHANCE TO PEE OUT THERE, SO I LOOK UP AT THE SKY AND REALIZE THE MAGNIFICENT OF WHAT I WAS LOOKING, THEN I GET INTO MY HOUSE FOR A JACKET AND MY VIDEO CAM TO SHOT THE SKY... (I HATE MY BROKEN ENGLISH...) I SAW A BUNCH OF STARS AND THEN I THOUGH ONE OF THOSE STARS STARTED TO MOVE AND COMING IN MY WAY, I STARTED TO RECORD AND WHEN I HAVE THAT THING OVER ME I HAVE TO CHOOSE IF I SHOULD KEEP IT RECORDING OR IF I SHOULD WATCH IT BY MY OWN EYES. I DID BOTH BUT WHAT I SAW WITH MY EYES WAS SOME KIND OF DISC WITH BLUE-WHITE-RED FLASHING SEQUENTIALLY LIGHTS IN THE SURFACE OF THAT "DISC" IN AN UNUSUAL ALTITUD, ACTUALLY I COULD SAY IT COULDN���T BE A SUPERSONIC AIR-CRAFT, I COULD EXPLAIN IT BETTER IN SPANISH. WELLL, THEN AFTER ALL I GOT REALLY NERVOUS BECAUSE I THOUGHT THEY OR THAT COULD SAW ME. I DON���T REALLY KNOW. FINALLY I CAME BACK TO MY COMPUTER AND CHECK THE VIDEO RECORDING. PLAYING THE VIDEO I SAW A LOT OF POSSIBLE TICKLING POINTS LOCATING THE OBJECT I���VE ALL READY RECORDED, THEN I FOUND IT, AND ZOOMING IN THE VIDEO SO I CAN WATCH THAT CRAFT CAREFULLY BUT BY A 5-7 FRAMES GOING FORTH IN THE SECUENCE, A IMPERCEPTIBLE FLASH MADE ME REALIZE THAT OVER THAT "CRAFT" WERE ANOTHER "THING" A CIGAR UFO. SO I HAVE VARIOUS ASPECTS IN THIS DESCRIPTION I COULD SPECIFY TO MAKE SENSE TO ANOTHERS.
Summary: HI TECH GOVERMENT SECRET AIR/SPACE CRAFT THEN UFO IN THE ANALYSIS OMG!
